member_organisations:
Our members are national associations of public health residents.  
 
They are represented by National Commissions, which are listed on the website: http://euronetmrph.org/euronet-national-comissions/
fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Economy, finance and the euro, Budget, International co-operation and development, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Environment, Youth, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Research and innovation, Trans-European Networks, Public Health, Food Safety, Digital economy and society
eu_initiatives: Health and public health workforce related EU initiatives. We do not follow EU initiatives on regular basis.
organisation_name: European Network of Medical Residents in Public Health (EuroNet MRPH)
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
